title: MinoRaiola
author: MinoRaiola
content: Hey, i open the second round  If anyone wants to play, write here: [2]Tippspiel ‚Äì CMC Top20 ‚Äì Drive a Lambo?Information:*Participation costs nothing.*Only one account is allowed per user. *You can participate as a registered user with 10 merit.*I reserve the right to exclude participants.*There is no guarantee if there a hack, or other unplanned events.Rules:*Tip the TOP 20 coins according Coinmarketcap.com by Market Cap.*Only one tip can be submitted.*Each user is responsible for the correctness of the information. *Tip submission until 30.04.2023.Submit your tip like this:Code:1. [COIN], 2. [COIN], 3. [COIN], 4. [COIN], 5. [COIN], 6. [COIN], 7. [COIN], 8. [COIN], 9. [COIN], 10. [COIN], 11. [COIN], 12. [COIN], 13. [COIN], 14. [COIN], 15. [COIN], 16. [COIN], 17. [COIN], 18. [COIN], 19. [COIN], 20. [COIN]BTC Price on 23.12.2023: XXX.XXX$ Evaluation + Points:*Placements will be made according to the number of points received.*Point distribution:-2 points for correctly tipped coin & order of the Top20.-1 point for correctly tipped coin within the Top20 -0 points in all other cases*In a tie, the BTC price in $ on 23.12.2023 will apply. *The participant with the smallest difference to the price wins. Price based on Coinmarketcap.com*The points count on 23.12.2023 20:00 (CET - Central European Time).*The legal process is excluded.Prize:1st place: Jochen Schweizer (Germany) experience Box ‚ÄûDream Car Drive‚Äú worth 149‚Ç¨2nd place: 50‚Ç¨ in BitcoinThe Prive can also transfer in BTC.In memory of 2022: Tippspiel ‚Äì CMC Top20 ‚Äì Drive a Lambo?

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: So anyone is free to play this prediction even if they are not local residents?

comments.author: MinoRaiola
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on April 15, 2023, 06:33:13 PMSo anyone is free to play this prediction even if they are not local residents?Hi ajiz138. You don‚Äôt have be local in Germany. If you win and don‚Äòt live in Germany, you can‚Äôt use the voucher. So you can get the value of the voucher in Bitcoin. That did last year the two winners and that is what we can do this year also. So feel free to get in. You can also submit your tip now, I look them all again on April 30.

comments.author: MinoRaiola
comments.created_time: April 30, 2023, 10:11:57 AMLast edit: April 30, 2023, 08:51:38 PM by MinoRaiola
comments.body: If someone wants to join, they are welcome to post in the German Thread today. I look later and check the postings. And dont worry, the win can also be paid in BTC. Have a nice sunny day.edit: The list is now updated. All postings checked and updated. Now it goas 8 months, and 1 day before christmas we have a winner. I wish all a lot of fun.

comments.author: MinoRaiola
comments.body: Its time, we have two winners:1. Place: ajiz138, Points: 24 / BTCprice: 51.000$ = Difference of 7.174,42$2. Place: sam00, Points: 23 / BTCprice: 34.549$ = Difference of 9.276,58$Last year there was a tie with 22 points and the Bitcoin price decided, this year is different.Coinmarketcap:Code:cmc = ['btc','eth','usdt','sol','bnb','xrp','usdc','ada','avax','doge','dot','trx','link','matic','ton','shib','ltc','dai','bch','atom']Code:Bitcoin Price: $43,825.58CMC TOP 20 23.12.23Source: coinmarketcap.comAll others:bullrun2020bro, Points: 21mole0815, Points: 16coineraser, Points: 22becassine, Points: 17woodie, Points: 21mv1986, Points: 21libert19, Points: 18ahoybrause, Points: 21unknown01, Points: 20nestade, Points: 22gazetabitcoin, Points: 19sea5ick, Points: 221miau, Points: 20Both please send me a PM. Congratulations.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: I didn't expect to be the first place as a champion, before I also noticed from the BOT notifications in the German local thread I wasn't optimistic if it hadn't been decided yet... But now the final result is a bit more relieved, it's really nice.
